findings.title: Old compiler has been used
findings.description: The contract uses an old compiler version which may introduce bugs.

findings.title: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared
findings.description: Functions that are never used within the contract should be declared as private to prevent potential unauthorized access.

findings.title: **SafeERC20** library imports unused SafeMath library
findings.description: The **SafeERC20** library imports the SafeMath library which is not being used, resulting in unnecessary gas consumption.

findings.title: Incorrect Use of Assert and Require
findings.description: The contract uses assert and require as error handling functions incorrectly, which can lead to unintended behavior and gas consumption.
